article_title: Video: ISIS terrorists blubber like babies when they’re caught and slapped around
article_text:
It turns out Islamic State jihadists are not as tough as they pretend to be on social media.

A video surfaced last month that allegedly showed a captured Islamic State extremists getting slapped around by soldiers. Suddenly all masculinity is lost and the Muslim militants are reduced to tears — bawling like babies.

The “tough guy” facade fades away in an instant as they whimper and whine, hoping their captor bullies stop hurting their sensitive feelings.

The terrorist’s reactions are such a far cry from that of the brave Americans that appeared in beheading videos, forced to give a statement before their lives were brutally ended.

Watch the crybabies sob it out below:

h/t: Mad World News

og.title: Video: ISIS terrorists blubber like babies when they're caught and slapped around

article_summary:
A video surfaced last month that allegedly showed a captured Islamic State extremists getting slapped around by soldiers.
It turns out Islamic State jihadists are not as tough as they pretend to be on social media.
The “tough guy” facade fades away in an instant as they whimper and whine, hoping their captor bullies stop hurting their sensitive feelings.
Suddenly all masculinity is lost and the Muslim militants are reduced to tears — bawling like babies.
The terrorist’s reactions are such a far cry from that of the brave Americans that appeared in beheading videos, forced to give a statement before their lives were brutally ended.
